item.title: Install vncserver ubuntu
item.description: Sources https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-install-and-configure-vnc-on-ubuntu-18-04 https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/TigerVNC https://www.realvnc.com/en/connect/download/viewer/ Connect via ssh ssh -L 5901:127.0.0.1:5901 -C -N -l gitlab-runner 195.201.56.187 Misc display-port and system-port is related the basic port is 5900 + (display-port)
